headline: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) Valuation Check After US$1b Pentagon Investment And Planned Missile Solutions IPO
summary: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) is in focus after the Pentagon agreed to invest US$1b in its solid rocket motors business, and the company outlined plans to spin off its Missile Solutions segment via an IPO in 2026. See our latest analysis for L3Harris Technologies.
